title: Climate Talks at COP29
narrative: Climate talks and human rights violations
content: 📢Event alert: Ahead of the upcoming climate talks #COP29, our very own @Camilla_Pollera will be at the @COP29CJC's meeting to discuss Global North’s climate inaction & connected violations of human rights violations.

title: Interactive Guide for COP16 Biodiversity Summit
content:
Interactive: Who wants what at the COP16 biodiversity summit | @aruna_sekhar @daisydunnesci @orladwyer_ @YanineQuiroz @GAViglione

title: Goals for Reducing Greenhouse Gas Emissions
content: Tripling renewables & doubling energy efficiency – goals set at COP28 – would cut greenhouse gas emissions by 10 billion tones by 2030 versus the current path. This would get the world 2/3 of the way to net-zero.
